name: airtable-database
description: Manage Airtable bases, tables, and records via the Airtable REST API. List bases, list tables, create/read/update/delete records, search with formulas, and bulk-create records. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: airtable_database
toolDefinition.description: Manage Airtable bases, tables, and records: list bases, list tables, list/get/create/update/delete records, search records by formula, and bulk create. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for Airtable API access.

action.description: list_records (list records from table), get_record (get single record), create_record (create record), update_record (update record), delete_record (delete record), search_records (search by formula), list_bases (list accessible bases), list_tables (list tables in base), bulk_create (create multiple records)

baseId.description: Airtable base ID. Required for all actions except list_bases.

tableId.description: Airtable table ID or name. Required for record actions.

recordId.description: Record ID. Required for get_record, update_record, delete_record.

fields.description: Fields object for create_record and update_record.

records.description: Array of {fields} objects for bulk_create. Max 10 at a time.

maxRecords.description: Maximum number of records to return (default 100).

filterByFormula.description: Airtable formula to filter records (optional for list_records).

view.description: View name or ID (optional for list_records).
